replies.body:
You need atleast 60 FPS for a good smooth game
You need 120 FPS for a very good smooth game
A human eye wont see a difference between 200 and anything above unless you are special. Theres a chance for example air force pilots.
And most monitors go with 60/75 FPS so your monitor wont even display that FPS.
